text: John Daniel Lazar is a former Major League Baseball pitcher. He pitched in parts of two seasons, 1968 and 1969, for the Chicago White Sox. An alum of Indiana State University, Lazar was elected to the ISU Hall of Fame in 2008 and inducted in 2009.Terre Haute Tribune-Star story from 27 October 2008 Twice he was named an All-ICC pitcher for the Sycamores; he led them in strikeouts and wins from 1963–65, he continues to hold the strikeouts record (single- game) at 16. ==References== ==External links== * ==Sources== Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Florida Rookie League White Sox players Category:Sarasota White Sox players Category:Clinton C-Sox players Category:Indianapolis Indians players Category:Lynchburg White Sox players Category:Evansville White Sox players Category:Hawaii Islanders players Category:Tucson Toros players Category:Baseball players from Indiana Category:Indiana State Sycamores baseball players Category:1943 births Category:Living people
title: Danny Lazar
